title: collectionMap
name: collectionMap
description:
Calls the given closure with every element in the given collection.
		the function returns a array or struct (depending on the input) that contains all values returned by the closure.

arguments.name: closure
arguments.description: UDF/Closure that is called with every value in the collection

arguments.name: maxThreads
arguments.description: maximum number of threads executed, ignored when argument "parallel" is set to false
